author: EPDVM
title: Why We Love This
text:
Putting your horse's supplements on AutoShip helps you take great care of your horse, so we take great care of you with SmartPerks! When you order your horse's supplements on AutoShip, you're automatically* eligible for our FREE SmartPerks benefits, including:
*At least one individual AutoShip supplement or horse's SmartPaks must be over $40. Some exclusions apply. Visit SmartPak.com/SmartPerks or call 1-800-461-8898 for details.
The Baker Irish Weave Anti-Sweat incorporates the best features from both American and European anti-sweat sheets into one timeless design. Unsurpassed for evenly cooling out a horse. The Baker Irish Weave Anti-Sweat can also be used as a blanket liner in the winter.
Imported.
Favorite Features:
Ingredient | Amount |
Material | Polyester |
Closure Style | Buckle |
Neck Style | Standard |
Surcingles | Two belly surcingles |
Customizable | Yes |
Special Features | Doubles as a blanket liner or fly sheet |
